summary: An undercover FBI agent faces a moral dilemma when he's asked to torture a member of one of the world's most powerful crime syndicates.
cast: Laurence Fishburne|James Cromwell|Kevin Pollak|Paul Perri|Cole Hauser|Robert LaSardo|Emmanuelle Chriqui|James Denton|Jon Cryer|Douglas Arthurs|Brad Kelly|A.C. Peterson|Chilton Crane|Karen Holness|Jordan Alexander|David Abbott|Patrick Sabongui|Shayn Solberg|Jan Bos|Mick Wilson|Annabel Kershaw|Jason Collins|William 'Big Sleeps' Stewart|Chris Nowland|Rodney Reid|Michelle Boback|Lisa Marie Caruk|Jon Arend|Josh Blacker|Jesse Bond|Curtis Caravaggio|Scott Miller|Kevin Kruchkywich|Alistair Abell|Bruno Verdoni|Zak Santiago|Daamen J. Krall|Ziggy
director: Director: Nolan Lebovitz (as Nolan H. Lebovitz)
title: Torturado
